section.5: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abdullah b. Abu Qatada reported on the authority of his father:While we said our prayer with the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) he heard tumult. (At the end of the prayer) he (the Holy Prophet) said: What is the matter with you? They said: We hastened to prayer. He (the Holy Prophet) said: Don't do that; when you come for prayer, there should be tranquillity upon you. Pray (along with the Imam) what you can find and complete what preceded you
